content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Assets is a Digital Asset Management (DAM) tool that is an integral part of the Experience Manager platform and enables users to manage and distribute digital assets.
